source_text: Consideration for the Alliance stake will be paid for through the issue of IVR shares (to a maximum of 15% of the Company) and any balance as a capped 1% NSR over production.
additional_details: The NSR royalty is a capped 1% over production, paid by Investigator (IVR) to Alliance as part of the consideration for Alliance selling its stake in the Joint Venture to Investigator.
